decrypt

public void decrypt(org.bouncycastle.crypto.CipherParameters decryptionKey)
             throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException,
                    IntegrityCheckFailureException
Decrypts content using decryptionKey. For some content formats, e.g. PGP, the content has several recipients and hence several public key encrypted session keys. In that case it is necessary to specify a recipient certificate.

Parameters:
recipient - the certificate of the private key owner.
key - the key that will decrypt the content.
Throws:
CertificateException - if there is a problem with the certificate.
InvalidKeyException - if the private key is not appropriate for the operation.
NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm implementation required to decrypt the content cannot be found.
BadDataFormatException - if decryption fails because the data is not in a valid format.
org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException
IntegrityCheckFailureException
